ingredients.ingredient: 1 (15 ounce) can HORMEL® Mary Kitchen® Corned Beef Hash
¼ cup finely diced green bell pepper
2 tablespoons canned diced tomatoes and green chiles
¼ cup shredded sharp Cheddar cheese

gear.name: Large cast iron or non-stick skillet

cookingTips: Use canned corned beef hash to save time and get a crispy exterior when heated in the skillet
Press the hash flat against the pan to create a crust before adding eggs
Cook eggs gently on medium heat to avoid scorching the bottom of the hash
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What's the trick to getting a golden, crispy hash cake before adding eggs on top?
